meanings.definition: Pervs (noun): plural form of perv, meaning a person who engages in sexually inappropriate behavior
meanings.sent1: Some pervs were caught peeking through windows in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The police are investigating the pervs who have been harassing people in the park.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show featured a character who always played the role of a silly perv.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the villain was portrayed as a cunning perv who manipulated others for his own gain.
meanings.sent5: The news report warned parents to be vigilant and protect their children from dangerous pervs.
